A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was shockingly bad. How can the critical average be so high? I loved The Force Awakens and Rogue One but this was just awful. Disney please do not let Rian Johnson touch another Star Wars project. I went into this film thinking that all of the criticisms I had heard about the movie were over blown but the opposite was true. So disappointed in almost every aspect of this film. I absolutely love Star Wars and I’m crushed by how bad this movie is.
